document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Voice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">stands </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Floods </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">sterile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">borne </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">makes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">Morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mean </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Glows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">impotent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">difference </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Substance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">lies </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Sum </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Financiers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">deemed </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Exclusive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Poverty! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The voice that stands for floods to me
